titles.title: To provide for the withholding of contributions to certain organizations that assist Iraq, Iran, Libya, and Cuba.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 11/29/1994--Introduced. Requires the President to withhold assessed and voluntary contributions of the United States to any international financial institution that furnishes assistance to Iraq, Iran, Libya, or Cuba.
